knowledge_panel.description: marble madness is an arcade video game designed by mark cerny and published by atari games and midway games in 1984. it is a platform game in which the player must guide a marble through six courses, populated with obstacles and enemies, within a time limit. the player controls the marble by using a trackball. wikipedia
